info.title: OTel Data API
info.description: REST API for OwnTracks/Garmin GPS data with PostGIS spatial queries

get.description: Liveness probe — returns healthy if the service is running.
Readiness probe — returns ready if the database is reachable.
List OwnTracks locations with filtering and pagination.

schema.title: Response List Devices Api V1 Locations Devices Get

get.description: Get total location count with optional filters.
Get a single location by ID, including raw payload.
List Garmin activities with filtering and pagination.
List distinct sport types with activity counts.

schema.title: Response List Sports Api V1 Garmin Sports Get

get.description: Get a single Garmin activity by ID with track point count.
List track points for a specific activity.
Query the unified_gps_points view combining OwnTracks + Garmin data.

parameters.name: source

schema.description: Filter by source: owntracks or garmin
schema.title: Source

parameters.description: Filter by source: owntracks or garmin

get.description: Query the daily_activity_summary view for aggregated daily stats.

schema.title: Response Daily Summary Api V1 Gps Daily Summary Get
Response List Reference Locations Api V1 Reference Locations Get

post.description: Create a new reference location (auth required).

get.description: Get a single reference location by ID.
Find GPS points within a radius of a given lat/lon using PostGIS ST_DWithin.

get.description: Calculate the distance in meters between two points using PostGIS ST_Distance.
